column4: Hello I need some ideas on fixing my localhost. The problem is when I run http://localhost it comes back saying localhost not found. I've looked at a lot of similliar problems but still my localhost does,nt work.
is it running?  check in terminal command ps -aux
in the same term type ping localhost
this is the result of ps -aux ping localhost ->http://pastebin.com/d59c1ee4b
i'm sorry, disregard those commands, and type cat /etc/hosts
ok,  do you see the difference in this file: http://pastebin.com/d5cb4db2a
type sudo nano /etc/hosts and edit accordingly
yes I saw the difference and I applied it i'm going to see if it had any effect?
